comments.body: this isn't really bazel-related, right? worth doing separately?

You found it already but for future reviewers https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/99923#discussion_r589101992

It could be done seperately.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +83,87 @@	handler, verifyConnectionWasMade := getRequestVerifier(t)

	server, _ := createTestServer(t, "./testdata/ca.pem", "./testdata/server.pem", "./testdata/server.key", handler)
	server.StartTLS()
	u := mustParseURL(t, server.URL)
